issue.title: [R] Alternate bindings for when libarrow is not found
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5499](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5499). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This will also allow the package to build and install successfully on hosts where the arrow C++ library is not present, which will enable us, among other things, to provide an `install_arrow()` function similar to other R packages that have big external dependencies.
